#summary Field - the shield background

=Description=

The field is the background of the shield, the lowest level of colouring, all other items are placed "above" the field.

==The Field==

The field can be either of the following:

  * [Tincture] (A single colour or repeating pattern)
  
  * [Division] (The shield divided into two or three areas, each with its own colour or pattern)
